English: Sanada...
Korean: 사나…… 다……
German: Sanada ...

English:
Why did you abandon Jude?
If you'd stayed, the team would still be together.
Chinese:
你為什麼，要捨棄Jude……
只要有你在，隊伍就能繼續下去……但你卻……
Korean:
어째서 쥬드를 버렸지……
네가 있었으면 팀은 계속 이어졌어…… 그런데도…
German:
Warum hast du Gamma verlassen?
Wärst du geblieben, wäre das Team noch zusammen.

English: Everyone was drawn to you.
Chinese: 大家都是欣賞你才聚集而來的。
Korean: 모두, 너에게 심취해서 모여들었다
German: Alle haben dich gemocht.

English:
I was no good.
You were the only one who could do it.
Chinese:
靠我是不行的……
不是你的話……就不行啊……！
Korean:
나로는 안 돼……
네가 아니면…… 안 되는 거였는데……!
German:
Ich war nutzlos.
Du warst der Einzige, der es konnte.

English:
Why did you just leave without saying why?
Answer me!
Chinese:
你為什麼連理由都不交待，就消失無蹤啊。
……回答我，真田！
Korean:
어째서 이유도 말하지 않고 사라진 거냐
……대답해라, 사나다!
German:
Warum bist du gegangen, ohne den Grund
zu nennen? Antworte mir!

English:
It wasn't that I didn't say why.
It was that I couldn't.
Chinese:
……我不是不說理由，
而是無法說出來。
Korean:
……말하지 않은 게 아냐.
말하지 못한 거다
German:
Es war nicht so, dass ich den Grund nicht nennen
wollte – sondern ich konnte es nicht.

English:
At the time, I couldn't explain why I didn't want
to carry on with the team anymore.
Chinese:
為什麼我不繼續待在隊伍──
那時候，我沒辦法說明。
Korean:
어째서 팀을 계속하지 않는지――
그 무렵엔 설명할 수 없었어
German:
Damals konnte ich nicht erklären, warum ich nicht
mit dem Team weitermachen wollte.

English:
But I can say now...because I've "remembered"
everything.
Chinese: 但我現在能說明了……畢竟我全都“想起來了”。
Korean:
하지만 지금이라면 대답할 수 있지…… 
전부 "떠올렸"으니까
German:
Aber jetzt kann ich es ... weil ich mich an alles
erinnern kann.

English:
The truth is, when I was a kid, I wasn't able to
protect my friend.
Chinese:
龍司，我啊……
在我還是小鬼的時候，也沒能保護好夥伴。
Korean:
나는 말이지, 류지……
어렸을 때 친구를 지키지 못했던 적이 있어
German:
Die Wahrheit ist: Als ich ein Kind war, konnte ich
meinen Freund nicht beschützen.

English: What?
Chinese: 什麼……？
German: Was?

English: Under Zero wasn't the first time I'd lost someone.
Chinese:
我並不是第一次……
在Under Zero失去夥伴。
Korean:
동료를 잃은 것은……
언더 제로에서가 처음이 아니었다는 거다
German:
Ich habe in Unter Null nicht zum ersten Mal
jemanden verloren.

English:
I was never qualified to lead anyone.
But I'd forgotten what had happened.
Chinese:
在很久以前開始，我就沒有
站在別人頭上領導人的資格了。
然而，我卻忘記了這件事。
Korean:
한참 전부터 나에겐 사람 위에 설 자격같은 건 없었어.
그런데도 나는 그걸 계속 잊고 있었다
German:
Ich habe nie zum Anführer getaugt.
Aber ich hatte vergessen, was passiert war.

English: That's what got our Jude friends killed.
Chinese: Jude的夥伴們，也是因為這樣才犧牲的
Korean: 쥬드의 동료는 그 때문에 희생되고 말았어
German:
Das war es, was unsere Freunde von Gamma
das Leben gekostet hat.

English:
What I went through when we lost our friends in
Under Zero all came flooding back. Not the memory,
but the feeling.
Chinese:
在Under Zero失去夥伴時，
我“想起來了”那件事情。
不是記憶，而是感覺。
Korean:
언더 제로에서 동료를 잃었을 때, 그 일을 "떠올렸"다.
기억이 아니라 감각으로 말이지
German:
Was ich durchgemacht habe, als wir unsere Freunde
in Unter Null verloren, kam alles wieder hoch.
Nicht die Erinnerungen, aber die Gefühle.

English:
That's why I left Jude, before I made the same
mistake again.
Chinese:
所以我逃離了Jude，
在我再次犯下同樣的錯誤之前。
Korean:
그래서 쥬드에서 도망쳤다.
또 같은 잘못을 반복하기 전에……
German:
Deshalb habe ich Gamma verlassen, bevor ich den
gleichen Fehler erneut begehen konnte.

English:
I had to get away, otherwise you'd try to make me
leader again.
Chinese: 也為了逃離，要再次把我推向隊長位置的你。
Korean: 나를 다시 한번 리더로 밀던 너로부터 도망친 거야
German:
Ich musste fortgehen, sonst hättest du mich wieder
zum Anführer gemacht.

English:
That's why I left Jude.
Are you satisfied now?
Chinese:
這就是我離開Jude的理由。
……這樣有回答到你了嗎？
Korean:
쥬드를 떠난 건 그게 이유다.
……답이 되었냐
German:
Deshalb habe ich Gamma verlassen.
Bist du jetzt zufrieden?

English: Sanada...
Chinese: ……真田。
Korean: ……사나다
German: Sanada ...

English: You say you couldn't have done it.
Chinese: ……而且，雖然你說做不來。
Korean: ……게다가 자기는 못한다고 그러지만
German: Du sagst, du hättest es nicht gekonnt.

English:
But you would have made an excellent leader.
Isn't Hudie a great team?
Chinese:
但我覺得，你很適合當隊長啊。
hudie……是一支好隊伍啊。
Korean:
너는 리더에 잘 어울린다고 생각해.
후디에는…… 좋은 팀이잖냐
German:
Aber du hättest einen hervorragenden Anführer
abgegeben. Ist Hudie nicht ein tolles Team?

English:
From now on, I'm going to help all the friends
I failed so long ago.
Chinese: 我接下來，要去救從前被我拋棄的夥伴。
Korean: 나는 지금부터 옛날에 버렸던 친구를 구하러 간다
German:
Von jetzt an werde ich all den Freunden helfen,
die ich vor so langer Zeit habe hängen lassen.

English:
Otherwise I'm nothing.
I can't even face you.
Chinese:
不去的話，我沒辦法重新開始，
也沒辦法面對你……我是這麼想的。
Korean:
그렇지 않으면 아무 것도 시작되지 않아.
너도 마주볼 수 없어… 그렇게 생각하니까
German:
Sonst bin ich ein Nichts.
Ich kann dir nicht einmal in die Augen sehen.

English:
You think you can do this, after running away for
so long?
Chinese:
你以為，你做得到那種事嗎？
像你這種一直逃避到現在的人……
Korean:
그런 걸 할 수 있을거라고 생각하냐?
계속 도망치기만 하던 네가……
German:
Glaubst du, ich könnte das, nachdem ich so
lange weggelaufen bin?

English: Jude is long gone.
Chinese: ……Jude，已經不在了。
Korean: ……쥬드는 이제 없어진 거군
German: Gamma gibt es schon lange nicht mehr.

English: That's right.
Chinese: ……對，沒錯。
Korean: ……그래, 맞아
German: So ist es.

English:
I'm going to retake the place where I belong.
Goodbye, Ryuji.
Chinese:
我要去取回我的棲身之處。
……再會了，龍司。
Korean:
나는 내가 있을 곳을 되찾으러 간다.
……잘 가라, 류지
German:
Ich werde mir mein Zuhause zurückerobern.
Leb wohl, Ryuji.

English:
I've done my part.
Now do what you want.
Chinese:
我的事已經辦完了。
之後……就照你的意思去做吧。
Korean:
내 용건은 끝났어.
이 다음엔…… 댁들 좋을대로 해
German:
Ich habe das Meine getan.
Jetzt mach, was du willst.

English:
Erika's waiting.
Chitose's waiting.
Let's go back together.
Chinese:
艾莉卡在等著
千歲在等著
一起回去吧
Korean:
에리카가 기다리고 있어
치토세가 기다리고 있어
함께 돌아가자
German:
Erika wartet.
Chitose wartet.
Gehen wir gemeinsam zurück.

English: How can I go back...after everything I've done?
Chinese: 現在……我哪還有臉……
Korean: 이제와서…… 무슨 면목으로……
German:
Wie kann ich zurück ... nach allem,
was ich getan habe?

English:
Either as the leader of Hudie, or as Erika's
brother...
Chinese:
不管是作為hudie的隊長，還是艾莉卡的哥哥。
我都……
Korean:
후디에의 리더로서도 에리카의 오빠로서도
나는……
German:
Sei es als Anführer von Hudie oder als
Erikas Bruder ...

English: Stop feeling sorry for yourself.
Chinese: ……別在那撒嬌了。
Korean: …응석부리지 마
German: Spar dir dein Selbstmitleid.

English: Chitose!
Korean: 치…토세……!
German: Chitose!

English:
I asked Matayoshi to get me out of the hospital.
I bet it's chaos over there right now, hehe.
Chinese:
我拜託又吉先生把我帶出醫院了。
現在醫院應該大亂了吧，嘿嘿。
Korean:
마타요시 씨에게 부탁해서 병원에서 데리고 나가달라고 했지.
지금쯤 병원에선 대소동이 났을걸, 헤헷
German:
Ich habe Matayoshi gebeten, mich aus dem
Krankenhaus zu holen. Ich wette, da drüben
herrscht jetzt das reinste Chaos. Hehe.

English: Kidnapped by the police! Unbelievable!
Chinese:
真是……居然叫警察來綁架，
真是太誇張了啊！
Korean: 정말…… 경찰에게 유괴를 시키다니 터무니없는 자식이야!
German: Von der Polizei entführt! Unfassbar!

English: Chitose... You're really okay.
Chinese: 千歲……你沒事了……是真的啊。
Korean: 치토세……무사…했었냐……정말로
German: Chitose ... Dir geht es wirklich gut.

English: Yep. I feel great.
Chinese: 喔，就是這樣。
Korean: 물론, 그렇지
German: Jepp. Mir geht’s prima.

English: Ryuji... You...
Chinese: 龍司……你啊──
Korean: 류지…… 너――
German: Ryuji ... Du ...

English:
Running amok in EDEN and then Tokyo?! What were
you thinking?! You idiot! Hackers are outlaws, but
surely they have limits!
Chinese:
不只在EDEN裡還到整個東京到處大鬧你在想什麼啊
這個大白痴！！就算說是駭客也是有分寸的啊蠢材！
更何況還對重要的Zaxon幹部下手，我們之後要怎麼
Korean:
EDEN도 모자라 도쿄에서 날뛰고 다니다니 뭘 생각하는 거냐
이 문어!!! 아무리 해커가 무법자라고 해도 한도라는게 있다고
이 멍청아! 심지어 단골 고객인 잭슨의 간부를 만신창이로
German:
Randale in EDEN und in Tokio?! Was hast du dir
dabei gedacht? Du Idiot! Hacker sind Kriminelle,
aber alles hat Grenzen!

English:
How do you expect us to deal with Hudie now?!
In hacking, reputation is everything!
Don't you understand that?!
Chinese:
經營hudie啊──你說啊！駭客也是在做生意的啊！
你真的知道嗎你這呆頭！？！？你就是這樣才會連
經營網路咖啡店還要我來幫忙無數次的啊！？對了
Korean:
만들고, 우리들 이제부터 어떻게 후디에를 꾸려나가야
되는 거냐아―――앗! 해커라도 일단은 손님을 상대하는
장사란걸 알고 있습니까 그런 부분!?!? 게다가 심지어
German:
Wie sollen wir uns jetzt um Hudie kümmern?!
Beim Hacking ist ein guter Ruf alles!
Verstehst du das denn nicht?!

English:
You had an Internet cafe to run! What did you
expect to gain by destroying everything?!
And how much will the repairs cost?!
Chinese:
還有店面！！！店面！！！居然搞到全毀你啊這可
不是能夠開玩笑的啊！！你以為這樣是要多少修理
費啊！！！數碼寶貝造成的災害要算什麼險啊！？
Korean:
너 인터넷 카페 경영도 내가 몇 번이고 보조해야 되는
꼴이 되는거잖아!? 그렇지, 게다가 가게야, 가게!!!
완전히 부순 것도 너 농담으로 끝날 일이 아니잖아!! 수리비
German:
Du hattest dich um ein Internetcafé zu kümmern!
Was sollte es bringen, alles zu zerstören?!
Und wie teuer werden die Reparaturen?!

English:
Damage caused by a Digimon?! Yeah, right! How do
you expect the insurance company to accept that?!
And because of you, Erika's lost her job!
Chinese:
什麼災！？！要怎麼跟保險公司講他們才能接受啊
！！更何況你還毀了我喜歡的打工妹妹的工作機會，
Korean:
얼마나 나올 거라고 생각하냐!!! 디지몬에 의한 재해란게 뭐냐!?
무슨 재해!?! 보험사를 뭐라고 납득시키면 좋은거냐아아앗!!
하필이면 내가 무지 좋아하는 알바양의 일자리까지 뺏고
German:
Schaden durch Digimon?! Aber sicher doch!
Welche Versicherung kommt dafür schon auf?!
Und wegen dir hat Erika ihren Job verloren!

English:
And as for using Digimon in Tokyo! Come on!
AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA
AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA
German:
Und Digimon in Tokio einzusetzen?! Ich meine ...
AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA
AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA

English:
AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA
AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA
German:
AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA
AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA

English:
AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA
AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA
AARRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRGH!!!
German:
AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA
AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA
AARRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRGH!!!

English:
Phew!
I think that's all for now.
Chinese:
……哈啊～～～～！！
總之……大概就是這樣。
Korean:
……우하아~~~!!!
뭐…… 대체로 이 정돈가
German:
Puh!
Ich glaube, das reicht fürs Erste.

English: Ryuji, you're okay now, so get it together.
Chinese:
……龍司，我已經沒事了，
所以你也振作點啊。
Korean:
……류지, 나는 이제 괜찮아.
그러니까 너도 정신차려
German:
Ryuji, alles ist wieder gut, also reiß
dich zusammen.

English:
No need to say anything. Just come back.
There are people waiting for you.
Chinese:
不用想那些理由藉口，回來吧。
別讓“弟妹們”哭泣啊……大哥！
Korean:
장황한 말은 됐으니까 돌아와
"아우"를 울리지 말라고…… 형님!
German:
Du musst gar nichts sagen. Komm nur zurück.
Wir warten alle auf dich.

English: Chitose...
Chinese: ……千歲。
Korean: ……치토세
German: Chitose ...

English: Hehe, he said everything I was going to say.
Chinese: ……嘿嘿，我想說的全都被說完了啊。
Korean: ……헤헷, 내가 하고 싶은 말은 이걸로 전부 해버렸네
German: Hehe, das wollte ich gerade sagen.
Ich ...
